sentences: The US reaffirmed its commitment to reduce its emissions intensity and opposed the creation of new bodies to review the communications.
AUSTRALIA said that while it did not intend to ratify the Protocol, it was still committed to achieving its emission target under the Protocol.
The G-77/CHINA and AOSIS expressed concern that emissions could continue to rise, despite mitigation measures, and urged Annex I Parties to implement more rigorous policies and measures.
Chair Stoycheva said that she would prepare draft conclusions on this issue.
